name: Frlog
description:
Frlog is a project made for Minijam 79: Frogs

In here, you play as a frog that tries to survive a flood by jumping from log to log. But the longer you play, the faster the logs go... how many times can you jump from your log before falling in the river ?

(collisions are currently horribly glitched. Logs are supposed to push you down, but for some reason, they often don't, making you touch the water and die.)

Controls:

Movement: Left - Right, Menu: X
